item.title: Experiences
item.description: Work Experience Deep Sentinel Inc., Pleasanton, CA, USA/Taipei, Taiwan Senior Software Engineer - March 2021 - November 2022 Evolved real-time deep-learning-based object detection. Engineered cutting-edge multimedia frameworks for real-time video streaming. Pioneered integration testing for virtualized IoT systems. Designed and implemented 3rd generation hub system. Contributed to Kubernetes-based microservices on GCP. RealTek Inc., Taipei, Taiwan Senior Software Engineer - September 2020 - March 2021 Designed a key-value database for power management storage.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Thesis Performance Improvement of OpenFlow Switch with Queue and Per-port Cache Cheng, Y. C., & Lin, Y. L. (2016). Performance Improvement of OpenFlow Switch with Queue and Per-port Cache.
